word: We bear the most solemn message ever given to our world, and physicians and ministers, with all other workers, are to draw together. They are not to pull apart. The physician is not to think that he will be more popular if he stands out separate from the gospel ministry. Doctors and ministers must draw together.--Ms 165, 1899, pp. 9, 18. ("Words of Counsel to Ministers and Physicians," December 26, 1899.)
